entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 9 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 9 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
